reviewText: My Hubby was at the game...great piece of memorabilia
Great DVD...must have for any gator fan!!!!

No problem with the DVD itself or the content on the DVD.  However, when I opened the package, the plastic broke into a million pieces like it was 40 year-old plastic.  Again, DVD is fine, but plastic case self-destructed

This is one of my favorite sports DVD to watch.  I sure loved reliving that season including Tebow's promise which was so cool. The DVD showed some cool profiles on the players, the top plays on offense, defense special teams. It was so cool they won the championship after Tebow made that promise.  I recommend this DVD for diehard Gator fans.

As a proud Gator alum and fan, this was a must for my DVD collection. My only complaint is that it is not HD. Other than browsing Youtube videos for game highlights, this is a nice purchase for any Gator fan.
My son is a sport fanatic! Although this is not the full game but the highlight is very entertaining. It shows the journey from the beginning to the end!
